item.description:
Imagine yourself braving the New Hamshire's premier haunted attraction. This thrilling & chilling event offers each patron a family-friendly, heart-pounding experience with two ALL-INDOOR state-of-the-art haunted houses: Bloodmare Manor & Toxic Terror in 3D! With a spooky atmosphere, original scenes, props, animatronics, and trained live actors, Fright Fest NH is sure to leave your palms sweaty, your hands shaking, and goose bumps galoreThe pride of accomplishment, the glory of facing the unknown and surviving. Being able to claim that you are fearless. Or imagine you wimp out and stay home. We don't want to go there, do we?

Bloodware Manor:
Every family has a few skeletons in the closet, right? But what if these skeletons are not quite dead? Built in the early 1800?s, Bloodmare Manor is home to the notorious and diabolical...
http://www.frightfest...

Toxic Terror in 3D
Something has gone terribly awry at the Scream Chemical Plant. The workers, who one operated this peaceful facility, have all been mutated in a horrible accident masterminded by..
http://www.frightfest...

Adult Admission: $17.00
Junior Admission*: $13.00
VIP Admission**: $25.00

Directions:
http://www.frightfest...

Note: This is the second part of the event. The first part is dinner at Bugaboo Creek at the Nashua Mall at 5 PM.
item.name: Something Scary Is Coming To Nashua ...
